```{r}
library(ggmap)

# subset the data
library(dplyr)
location <- filter(crime, day == "friday")

library(mapview)
library(sf)
mymap <- st_as_sf(location, coords = c("lon", "lat"), crs = 4326)
mapview(mymap, color="black", col.regions="red",
        alpha.regions=0.5, legend = FALSE,
        homebutton = FALSE, map.types = "OpenStreetMap" )
```
